channel.title: Mathematics :: MNP
channel.description: This section wil cover posts about mathematics; I love logic, set-theory, combinatorics, optimization.

item.title: The Diagonalization Argument
item.description: How did I get here? Some 20 years ago, when I was an undergraduate (CS) student, I was pretty fond of theoretical computer science, but I also secretly joined fellow students in their math classes, but also lead me to pursue mathematics laterâ€¦ During that time I usually earned some extra money as a tutor for theoretical CS and mathematics. Back then I often observed that both students and teachers, struggled to explain the technique of the diagonal argument in a general sense.
